definition: take up residence and become established
details:
verb
- take up residence and become established
= synonyms: settle
- discover the location of
= synonyms: turn up
- assign a location to
= example: assign a location to
= synonyms: place
- determine or indicate the place, site, or limits of, as if by an instrument or by a survey
= example: determine or indicate the place, site, or limits of, as if by an instrument or by a survey
= synonyms: situate
